channel.title: Client problem
channel.description: i got a code from someone on here for my compile is it possible to get a code to run a client cuz when i run my client i get a error path cannot be specified

item.title: Client problem
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Replace it with this then:

@echo off title Run Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

item.title: Client problem
item.dc:creator: @linkedd linkedd
item.description:
@linkedd wrote:

@echo off
:menu
cls
title Client Tools by Galkon
echo Client Tools
echo.
echo C - Compile client.
echo R - Run client.
echo CR - Compile, then run client immediately; be 100% sure of no errors!
echo E - Exit.
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==C goto compile
if %option%==R goto run
if %option%==r goto run
if %option%==rc goto CR
if %option%==RC goto CR
if %option%==rC goto CR
if %option%==Rc goto CR
if %option%==cr goto CR
if %option%==CR goto CR
if %option%==cR goto CR
if %option%==Cr goto CR
if %option%==e goto exit
if %option%==E goto exit
if %option%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
title Compiler
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
title Run
java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:CR
title Compile-Run
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
title Run
java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:exit
cls
exit
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu

Read full topic
